title: Half Way to Hell
description: Rose Aguilar finds herself relapsing to her old vices.  One night.  One night was all it takes for Rose to fall head over heels for Joseph Warner once again. Her head is telling her to stay away, that his world is one that she should never be in, but her heart is telling her to chase after him.   Joseph Warner is caught between a rock and a hard place.  The simmering conflict with the cartels in the south has become a full-blown war and he is determined to keep Rose safe from the cross-fire, no matter what it takes.   They must make their choice and live with the repercussions.  When the cartel puts a target on Joseph's back, he knows the danger that both of them are in. But she is determined to stay by his side, consequences be damned  Meanwhile, the cartel is coming.
author: Candice Owen
